meanings.sent1: The airfreights arrived safely at the airport.
meanings.sent2: We shipped the airfreights to their destination quickly.
meanings.sent3: The airfreights were so light, they almost floated away!
meanings.sent4: The importance of airfreights in global trade cannot be overstated.
meanings.sent5: The company specializes in handling delicate airfreights with care.

meanings.sent1: They airfreight the products to meet tight deadlines.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to airfreight the emergency supplies.
meanings.sent3: I airfreight my packages when I need them to arrive quickly.
meanings.sent4: She airfreights her handmade crafts to customers around the world.
meanings.sent5: Airfreighting fresh produce ensures it reaches markets in prime condition.
